docs.text: Paid Time Off (PTO) accrues bi-weekly. Sick leave is tracked separately. For extended medical leave, employees file an FMLA request. Managers approve PTO in the HRIS tool.
PII includes names, emails, phone numbers, SSNs, and financial data. Redact PII before indexing content. Use allow-lists for external tool calls.
For Sev2+ incidents: page on-call, post status in #incidents, and start a Zoom bridge. Record timeline, owners, and mitigations. Follow postmortem template within 48 hours.
Chunk with overlap (200-400 tokens). Store source and ACL metadata. Use MMR and optional re-rankers. Return citations and track groundedness with offline evals.
